channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Volvo is moving EV production from China to Belgium as the EU eyes tariffs on Beijing
item.description: On top of transferring production of Volvo’s EX30 and EX90 models to Belgium, the carmaker may also move assembly of some Volvo models bound for the UK.

item.title: Gold is getting harder to find as miners struggle to excavate more, World Gold Council says
item.description: The gold mining industry is struggling to sustain production growth as deposits of the yellow metal become harder to find, said the World Gold Council.

item.title: How Wall Street’s hopes for multiple Fed rate cuts this year came undone
Benny Gantz quits Israel’s government, saying Netanyahu is preventing a ‘true victory’ over Hamas
item.description: Far-right party leader Itamar Ben Gvir demanded to be added to the war cabinet in Gantz’s place.

item.title: Looking to work in India? Talent is in high demand in these 5 industries, according to Indeed
item.description: These are the top search terms used by employers in India in 2023, when looking for talent on hiring and matching platform, Indeed.

item.title: Buckle up: Stock market will face a double whammy this week
Donald Trump will be interviewed by probation officials ahead of his sentencing for N.Y. felony convictions
item.description: Trump will do the interview via a computer video conference from his residence at the Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Florida.

item.title: Asia markets are mixed ahead of Fed and BOJ decisions this week
item.description: Traders will be watching the Fed's rate decision on Wednesday, as well as the Bank of Japan's policy meeting later this week.

item.title: 5 things economists will be closely watching at this week's Fed meeting
Far-right parties make stunning gains in EU election, prompting Macron to call snap vote in France
item.description: The long-established Social Democratic party also fell behind the extreme-right Alternative for Germany.

item.title: Beyond the Magnificent 7: Morgan Stanley fund manager says diversify with these 2 stocks
item.description: A "troublesome" focus on tech stocks has led one portfolio manager to recommend diversifying, naming two stocks in particular.

item.title: Apple’s WWDC is Monday. Here are 5 things to expect as AI comes into focus.
'Bond King' Bill Gross is about to make a killing on his stamp collection, but he thinks the market is due for a correction and is getting out
item.description: The Robert A. Siegel auction house said "this collection promises to set a new high-water mark for stamp collecting when it crosses the auction block."

item.title: 'Blew my mind': Investor says one key stat shows Nvidia is in it for the long haul
item.description: The chief investment officer points to a notable estimate from Wall Street analysts.

item.title: EU projection shows far-right parties making big gains in European elections
